meanings.definition: The reproduction of sound using four separate channels.

meanings.sent2: I love listening to music in quadriphonics because it feels like the sound is surrounding me.
meanings.sent3: The quadriphonics system at the concert made it seem like the band was playing right next to me!
meanings.sent4: Her quadriphonics setup at home created a musical experience that was out of this world.
meanings.sent5: The quadriphonics technology truly enhances the way we perceive sound.
